answers.answer: omg i had severe pre eclampsia with my 1st child and delivered at 31 wks also iv just found out im pregnant again and im terrified its goin to happen again. the doctors told me i wouldnt get that bad again if i were to fall pregnant again and urged me to try for another baby. they mentioned puttin me on asprin which would thin my blood i,m kind of scared now xx

I was told that it would not happen the 2nd time but it did, and then the doctors said that if they thought it was going to happen they could have tried to prevent it. I am hoping that they will monitor me more closely this time around, and do something to try to help me go full term. 2 different doctors told me that it is usually just a one time thing, but now since it happened to me again chances are it will happen again, but you may not have the same problem.
